sentences.sContent: Draw me not aside to indolence and pride.
sentences.sContent_eng: Draw me not aside to indolence and pride.
sentences.sCn: 不要使我偏离到懒惰和骄傲。

sentences.sContent: Human is always indolence, we must beat our nature .
sentences.sContent_eng: Human is always indolence, we must beat our nature .
sentences.sCn: 人总是懒惰，我们必须击败我们的本性。

sentences.sContent: The difficulties in the SALL is persevering it all the time. Human is always indolence, we must beat our nature . Persist to get the desired results.
sentences.sContent_eng: The difficulties in the SALL is persevering it all the time. Human is always indolence, we must beat our nature . Persist to get the desired results.
sentences.sCn: 在自主学习的困难是坚持它的所有时间。人总是懒惰，我们必须击败我们的本性。坚持得到想要的结果。
